original_text: And the king commanded Hilkiah the high priest, and the priests of the second order, and the keepers of the door, to bring forth out of the temple of the Lord all the vessels that were made for Baal, and for the grove, and for all the host of heaven: and he burned them without Jerusalem in the fields of Kidron, and carried the ashes of them unto Bethel.
korean_text: 왕이 대제사장 힐기야와 모든 부제사장들과 문을 지킨 자들에게 명령하여 바알과 아세라와 하늘의 일월 성신을 위하여 만든 모든 그릇들을 여호와의 성전에서 내다가 예루살렘 바깥 기드론 밭에서 불사르고 그것들의 재를 벧엘로 가져가게 하고

sentences.original_text: And the king commanded Hilkiah the high priest
and the priests of the second order
and the keepers of the door
to bring forth out of the temple of the Lord
all the vessels that were made for Baal
and for all the host of heaven:
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘의 모든 군대를 위한 것들을 가져오게 하고

sentences.original_text: and he burned them without Jerusalem
and carried the ashes of them unto Bethel.
